settings.text:
We're VERY close to finishing our long-awaited Smart Coffee.

We have been working on this for aver a year (including more than 25 formulations), but we are finally going to wrap it up. We will be releasing it early next year.

This product will be entirely focused on "Brain and Body Optimization."

It will include ingredients picked to boost brain power, enhance energy, and improve immunity and gut health. Plus... it tastes like REAL COFFEE!

We're giving regular coffee a run for it's money. We took everything you LOVE about coffee, removed what you don't, and added supplements to unlock your peak performance. We're talking better focus and health, without the jitters or afternoon crash.

HOWEVER, we need your help. Before we finalize everything and send it off to be made, we need to make sure we have covered everything.

That is where you come in. Please take a few minutes to answer this super-short survey - there is really only one thing we want to ask you...
